item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Sophie Ellis-Bextor - Bittersweet (Freemasons Mixes)
item.description:
Hi. Does anyone have the MP3's for all the Freemasons mixes of Sophie Ellis-Bextor's single Bittersweet that they'd be able to upload here, please? I remember when the song first came out all these remixes were available to buy as MP3 downloads and I'm sure I had them but can't find them anymore. Probably on my old computer and I forgot to transfer them over. They no longer seem to be available anywhere. When I check on Amazon and Itunes for MP3 purchases the only version of Bittersweet available is the original album version, which I'm not keen on at all. I think the Freemasons versions totally lifted the song to a different level and as well as a 3.30 mins (approximately) radio edit remix there's also one of around 4.30 or 5 mins version and a long club mix version nearly 9 minutes long, all by Freemasons. I don't care for the Jodie Harsh mixes of the song, only the Freemasons. I know I could just download them from YouTube but the sound quality isn't very good, I'd love to have the proper original MP3's that were originally released. I don't understand why these great mixes aren't even on any streaming sites to listen to!

Hope someone can help or direct me to where I can buy the MP3's if there is a site I don't know about! Thanks in advance.
item.author: Pant-hooting Chimp
